content:
We've had a few people ask if there is a way to buy our Changelog Beats albums directly from us as digital downloads. Yes, you (now) can!

All four albums are up for sale for $10 each (as an mp3, wav, flac bundle)

  1. Theme Songs
  2. Next Level
  3. Dance Party
  4. After Party

I also set up a coupon code for y'all to get a free album for each one you purchase: BOGOBEATS

That means right now you can own our entire catalog for half price and still support us while you're at it :green_heart:

Of course, all of the streaming options are still there and you can also buy direct from BMC's Bandcamp, which is a great options as well.
Vinyls coming soon? :eyes:

Best day when Sunken Barge Zone - Adam’s Sudden Death Version dropped in Spotify :sunglasses: Lost count how many times it’s played.

Thank you :raised_hands: @Jerod Santo @Breakmaster Cylinder @Adam Stacoviak (took me a minute to get to Zulip to say that :upside_down:, but I’ve been loving it)
